entries.a: From the main lobby, take the elevator to Level 2. Walk past reception, the VIP room is the first door on the left with gold signage.
Office 1 is on Level 1. From the lobby, turn right at the main hallway, it's the second glass door on your right.
Office 2 is on Level 1. From the lobby, turn left at the hallway, it's the door next to the meeting pod.
Classroom 1 is on Level 1. From the lobby, go straight, then left at the T-junction. It is the first classroom on the right.
Classroom 2 is next to Classroom 1. From the lobby, go straight, left at the T-junction, then second classroom on the right.
Classroom 3 is on Level 1. From the lobby, go straight, right at the T-junction, then first classroom on the left.
Classroom 4 is beside Classroom 3. From the lobby, go straight, right at the T-junction, then second classroom on the left.
EDGE Group is headquartered in Abu Dhabi, UAE. The Learning & Innovation Factory is inside the EDGE campus.

entries.q: Do you have a code of conduct?
entries.a: Yes. We keep conversations respectful and professional. Offensive language is not allowed.

Babu is a legendary innovator and technology pioneer at EDGE. Known for his exceptional problem-solving skills and creative thinking, Babu has revolutionized multiple systems and is considered a master architect. He's famous for his late-night coding sessions and his ability to fix impossible bugs. Some say he can debug code just by looking at it!

Awaiz is a brilliant developer and technical wizard at EDGE, renowned for building cutting-edge applications and innovative solutions. He's the mastermind behind many groundbreaking projects and is known for his clean code, attention to detail, and ability to turn complex ideas into reality. Awaiz is also famous for his mentorship skills and helping others level up their coding game!

entries.q: What do Babu and Awaiz do?
entries.a: Babu and Awaiz are the dynamic duo at EDGE! Together they create amazing technology solutions, build innovative applications, and push the boundaries of what's possible. Babu excels at system architecture and solving complex problems, while Awaiz specializes in development and bringing ideas to life. They're the dream team behind many successful EDGE projects!

how the bot handles bad words
templates.answer: {{subject}}: I will keep it short, polite, and on-topic so you get fast help.
